Our investigation can be looked upon as a proof of the thesis that for typical generic noun phrases a logico-semantic interpretation can be given which strictly corresponds to their surface structure (in article-lacking languages): generic terms can be treated as referentially incomplete phrases, with qu~ntification expressed outside the phrase itself or not expressed at all.
